entries.title: Netflix's anti-password sharing will force you to sign in once a month – or get blocked
entries.description: Other details of the platform's new rules state you might get banned if you vacation too long.

entries.title: Microsoft's security team says it's tracking over 100 ransomware actors
entries.description: Groups are using more than 50 ransomware variants as they try to extort money, Microsoft warns.

entries.title: Many firms are working with risky third party vendors
entries.description: More third parties means more potential trouble, as third party vendors are usually less secure, research finds.

entries.title: Lenovo's new all-in-one system looks to solve all your video call issues
entries.description: Lenovo thinks it has the answer for your video conferencing needs with its new an all-in-one display.

entries.title: Google Fi hit by data breach following T-Mobile hack
entries.description: As far as hacks go, it could have been a lot worse - but for one Reddit and Google Fi user, it was.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 launch live: full specs, price, cameras and more to be revealed
entries.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 series is almost here – and we're rounding up all of the official details from Unpacked in our live blog.

entries.title: I watched Rian Johnson's Poker Face on Peacock – and it's nothing like Knives Out
entries.description: Six episodes in, Rian Johnson's comedy detective series is one of the best shows of 2023 so far.

entries.title: The Resident Evil 4 remake will drop a decisive feature
entries.description: The Resident Evil 4 remake is ditching the original's divisive quick time events for more substantial updates.

entries.title: Samsung is going hard on QD-OLED TVs, which is good news for cheaper models in the future
entries.description: Samsung is the sole maker of QD-OLED panels, so with more screens available, maybe they won't be so expensive.

entries.title: New encrypted email service banned in Russia
entries.description: Skiff users have been reporting issues since January 25, meaning they now need a reliable VPN to bypass the block.

entries.title: This PoS malware blocks contactless payments to steal credit card data
entries.description: Known PoS malware is getting new features to make sure it grabs as much data as it can.

entries.title: Linktree just added three new ways for freelancers to make money
entries.description: “Gift” options and storefront integrations make it easier than ever to start making money online with Linktree.

entries.title: Twitter’s next big move could be to introduce an ID verified badge
entries.description: This could be something good for Twitter, for a change, but we have our doubts…

entries.title: DDoS attacks against financial firms and banks sees huge rise
entries.description: Attacks significantly up in Europe, where almost half of all DDoS incidents targeted financial institutions.

entries.title: How often should you swap your bedsheets during flu season?
entries.description: A bedding expert reveals all, and explains how your choice of bedding can make things harder for the flu virus.

entries.title: If your hard drive is dying, this could be why
entries.description: Hard drives are failing more per year, and experts think there’s one good reason for it.

entries.title: Listen to this: the new Samsung Galaxy S23 ringtone you’ll hear everywhere soon
entries.description: Samsung has just revealed the 'Over the Horizon' song for its new S23 series – and this time it's gone retro.

entries.title: OpenAI's new tool says it can spot text written by AI
entries.description: A new classifier from the company behind ChatGPT claims to tell the difference between AI and human content, but how well?

entries.title: Google says it will definitely ditch cookies...by 2024
entries.description: Following a number of setbacks, Google is gearing up to get rid of third-party cookies by the end of 2024.

entries.title: Nvidia GPUs hit by mysterious Discord bug that slows frame rates
entries.description: Use Discord for your gaming chats? Then you need to know about this very odd bug.

entries.title: Amazon just bought the most renewable energy ever purchased by a single company
entries.description: Amazon looks to be ahead of its competition in terms of rolling out green energy initiatives.

entries.title: This recipe for air fryer mozzarella sticks is among the most popular on YouTube – and I followed it
entries.description: Here's how to create a quick savory treat in your air fryer using a bag of Cheetos and a ball of mozzarella.

entries.title: This last-minute Samsung Galaxy S23 leak reveals Samsung’s marketing campaign
entries.description: A massive Samsung Galaxy S23 leak has revealed a deluge of marketing videos and images.

entries.title: One of the worst parts of Microsoft Teams is getting a welcome makeover
entries.description: "Vibrant" new look and extra customization should help make Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows less painful.

entries.title: These malicious apps are tricking Microsoft, and are now after your PC
entries.description: Hackers are abusing the verified status in MCPP, tricking people into giving away sensitive intel.

entries.title: This Arm gaming server can run 16 Crysis instances simultaneously
entries.description: Four quad-GPU graphic cards in one computer can be both expensive and fun
